author: bodewig
msg: skip test that tries to set a system level environment variable if user lacks the permission to set it.  LOG4NET-301

author: jmeehan
msg: DEFT-170 - Close channel on EOF read/empty write.

author: arkurth
msg: Updated inuse.pm::_start_imaging_request to catch the condition where xmlrpc_call fails and returns null. Changed behavior to set the originating request state to maintenance/inuse instead of maintenance/image if the call to _start_imaging_request fails. Made indentation consistent.

author: markt
msg: Add info on setting infinite timeouts.

author: veithen
msg: Use the OMXMLBuilderFactory API instead of creating a StAXOMBuilder directly, so that non standard Axiom implementations can be used.
